title: कई फ़र्ज़ी अकॉउंट, भारत/पाक अधिकारियों का हवाला देकर साझा कर रहे हैं गलत जानकारियां
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: In Pakistan, anyone who is not Sunni Punjabi is Wajib-ul-Qatl. The story of this Lt Col is not surprising. According to Pakistan’s Constitution an Ahmadi can be jailed for simply calling his place of worship a masjid. Ahmadis in Pakistan are treated worse than animals. https://t.co/zW1ukI419p
